attributes.action: Force Councils to Scan Dead cats for Microchips and contact their owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, when a cat is found dead on the road - the countils in England and Wales send the refuse collectors to dispose of them.  No attempt is made to contact the owners.  We would like to force them to scan for Microchips and contact the pets owners

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Force Councils to Scan Dead cats for Microchips and contact their owners."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17308


Prime Minister's Office
